name: the-tales-of-aquilos
title: The Tales of Aquilos
description: A homebrew content module for the world of Aquilos, built for Foundry VTT's pf2e game system.
author: LockeGenRedux

guardian.label: Guardian
guardian.description: A creature with this trait is designated as a Guardian for the purposes of Junction, allowing certain characters or Ikonists to make connections with them and gain bond levels.

hecaton-arm.label: Hecaton Arm
hecaton-arm.description: Hecaton Arms are a form of gadget that can only be used in conjunction with a Hecatoncheires. Each one has a unique look, function, and grants a set of Boost and Breaker actions that can be taken while one is affixed. These do not affect your ability to manipulate items or use your hand in any way, despite some of their appearances.

paired.label: Paired
paired.description: An item with this trait requires you to have both components in order to use the additional functions that the item may have.

aervahl.label: Aervahl
aervahl.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the Aervahl ancestry. These quadrapedal, magical creations have a wide variety of animalistic features and an a strong source of transmutative magic within.

capra.label: Capra
capra.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the Capra ancestry. These humanoid bovid people have a penchant for friendly conversation and problem solving, alongside their often unnerving or entrancing appearances.

diz.label: Diz
diz.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the Diz ancestry, often called catfolk or amurrun interchangably. These feline humanoids often have a sensitivity to time and a desire to wander, and this trait is unique to Aquilos.

drachenar.label: Drachenar
drachenar.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the Drachenar ancestry. These half-giant, half-dragon folk grow to be massive forces of nature and are typically elementally aligned.

dracosis.label: Dracosis
dracosis.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the Dracosis ancestry. These winged draconic beings resemble dragons and have a deep hunger for magic and fixations.

syldir.label: Syldir
syldir.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the Syldir ancestry. These magic-intuned canine folk are often telepathic and have a strong attachment to the Tapestry and magic itself.

tetra.label: Tetra
tetra.description: Effects with the tetra trait tend to be rare and often unseen, as Tetra magic itself is not used by many ancestries. These effects often bend the rules of the world in unexpected ways.

gravity.label: Gravity
gravity.description: Effects with the gravity trait tend to deal with entropy and the weight of gravity. These effects rarely work in areas of zero gravity.

bond.label: Bond
bond.description: Effects with the bond trait are typically related to Guardians and the pinnacle of power achieved from being Junctioned to them. Bond spells work similar to Incarnate spells, with an arrival and departure effect, but often linger for a longer period of time and can act at the end of your turn as if they were independent creatures while sustained.

hecaton-arm.label: Hecaton Arm
hecaton-arm.description: Hecaton Arms are a form of gadget that can only be used in conjunction with a Hecatoncheires. Each one has a unique look, function, and grants a set of Boost and Breaker actions that can be taken while one is affixed. These do not affect your ability to manipulate items or use your hand in any way, despite some of their appearances.

kythrm.label: Kythrm
kythrm.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the kythrm ancestry. These feathered humanoids have long wing-like fingers and a bone chestplate called a keel. A weapon with this trait is a weapon which Kythrm craft and use.

salyre.label: Salyre
salyre.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the salyre ancestry. These fuzzy, lagomorphic humanoids have a penchant for hopping planes and getting into new adventures. A weapon with this trait is a weapon which Salyre craft and use.

eridae.label: Eridae
eridae.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the eridae ancestry. These furred, bipedal humanoids have bear-like features and an affinity for nature. A weapon with this trait is a weapon which Eridae craft and use.
